subtitle.line1: Privacy is a fundamental human right. Here, at Internxt we believe that what humanity can achieve
subtitle.line2: is extraordinary and that products should enable society to achieve excellence. These products
subtitle.line3: should not only empower people but must also be respectful. Say hello to Internxt.
subtitle.line4: Private by default, secure by design, and free as in freedom.
subtitle.line5: Start using Internxt Drive today, a secure, private, distributed, open-source, encrypted, free, cloud storage service.

subtitle.line1: Today the Internet is controlled by technology giants that offer services and products that
subtitle.line2: are a means to an end. Services that have become essential in our lives and are used to collect
subtitle.line3: data from users to better profile them, as they live off advertising. Privacy should not have
subtitle.line4: such a high cost. We believe in a more ethical internet, where user privacy is at its core.

securitum.title: Internxt Successfully Passes Independent Security Audit
securitum.subtitle: Read the complete security audit reports:

subtitle.line1: We take privacy and security very seriously, that's why we have a stack of technologies
subtitle.line2: and protocols to always ensure that your data remains safe and private.

square1.title: Military-grade encryption.
square1.description: All the data you store in your Internxt account is encrypted with AES-256. This means that the most powerful processor in the world would need twice the age of the universe to decrypt a small file.

square2.title: Zero-knowledge technology.
square2.description: We ensure that there is no point in time where files, photos, passwords, or any kind of unencrypted data is visible to unauthorized users or servers.

square3.title: GDPR-compliant synchronization.
square3.description: Our commitment is to conform with all GDPR provisions such as privacy by design, the right to information, and the right to be forgotten among many others, and meet future provisions.

square4.title: End-to-end encryption.
square4.description: Everything you store or transfer is encrypted before leaving your device, making it impossible to decrypt without the user's permission, even we can’t access your files, photos or passwords.

subtitle.line1: When you use free products from big technology companies the price is your data.
subtitle.line2: Our products will never sell your data, even our free plans are on us.

square1.title: Drive lets you choose what to store and share.
square1.description: Drive doesn’t access your personal data or files for ad purposes, instead is designed to give you back control over your files and protect you from data collection and advertising companies.
square1.cta: Take back control over my files

square2.title: With Photos privacy is always on focus.
square2.description: Photos is designed and developed to help you keep a synced gallery of your most perfect moments and give you control of who you want to share them with.

square3.title: Send with absolute certainty.
square3.description: Send allows you to encrypt and share large files fast without worrying about the security of your documents, images, or videos. Transfer to anyone in total confidentiality.
